title: R & D expenditure of BP 2010 to 2018
summary: Overall Expenditure in million U.S. dollars has decreased over the Year.
Expenditure in million U.S. dollars is roughly constant from 2012 to 2014, and finally slightly decreasing from 2014 to 2015.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2014 and 2015.
The highest Expenditure in million U.S. dollars, of value 707.0 was reached at Year 2013
Minimum Expenditure in million U.S. dollars about 418.0 was reached at Year 2015
